scripts.dev: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && source ../../.env; [ -f ../../.env.dev-auth ] && source ../../.env.dev-auth; set +a; tsx watch src/main.ts'
scripts.dev:fresh: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && source ../../.env; [ -f ../../.env.dev-auth ] && source ../../.env.dev-auth; set +a; export WORKER_MIN_JOB_CREATED_AT="$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)"; tsx watch src/main.ts'
scripts.start: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../../.env ] && source ../../.env; [ -f ../../.env.dev-auth ] && source ../../.env.dev-auth; set +a; node dist/main.js'
